keyword: how many calories are in a soda cracker
title: How Many Calories Are in a Soda Cracker?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a soda cracker, including carbs, sodium, fat, and other nutrients on a per-cracker basis with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Soda Cracker?
assumptions: Standard plain saltine soda cracker, approximately 5 g each, no toppings or added fats.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, ingredients, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard soda cracker contains about 13 kcal and is low in fat and protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a soda cracker?
faqs.a: Approximately 13 kcal per standard soda cracker.

faqs.q: What is the sodium content in one soda cracker?
faqs.a: About 135 mg of sodium per cracker.

faqs.q: Do soda crackers have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.3 g protein and 0.3 g fat per cracker.

faqs.q: Are soda crackers high in carbs?
faqs.a: They have about 2.2 g carbs per cracker, mostly refined flour.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in soda crackers?
faqs.a: Brands vary slightly; some low-fat versions may have 10-12 kcal.
